INSERT INTO FOLLOW VALUES( #{followerMno}, #{mNo} )
fm.MEMBER_NO AS FOLLOW_MEMBER_NO, ft.MEMBER_NO AS FOLLOW_TARGET_MEMBER_NO, COUNT(f.FOLLOW_MEMBER_NO) AS FOLLOW_COUNT, LISTAGG(f.FOLLOW_TARGET_MEMBER_NO, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY f.FOLLOW_TARGET_MEMBER_NO) AS FOLLOW_LIST FROM FOLLOW f JOIN MEMBER fm ON f.FOLLOW_MEMBER_NO = fm.MEMBER_NO JOIN MEMBER ft ON f.FOLLOW_TARGET_MEMBER_NO = ft.MEMBER_NO WHERE fm.MEMBER_NO = #{mNo} GROUP BY fm.MEMBER_NO, ft.MEMBER_NO;

MEMBER_PROFILE_IMAGE_NO = #{memberProfileImageNo},
MEMBER_BANNER_NO = #{memberBannerNo},
MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{nickName}, MEMBER_EMAIL = #{email}, MEMBER_INTRODUCE = #{introduce} WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
